title: Experience the Very Best of Wine Country at Meadowood and Farmhouse Inn
text:
Experience the Very Best of Wine Country at Meadowood and Farmhouse Inn Farmhouse Rebekah Bell September 30, 2015 
Set against rolling hills, wreathed grapevines, and amber-hued sunsets, Napa Valley and Sonoma are home to some of the finest wineries in Northern California. Thanks to the Napa Valley—Sonoma Valley Getaway vacation package offered by the hotels Meadowood Napa Valley and the Farmhouse Inn in Sonoma, wine connoisseurs can experience the region’s finest offerings with customized vineyard excursions and plenty of pampering. At Meadowood, guests are welcomed to their room or suite with a complimentary bottle of Napa Valley sparkling wine. Their two-night stay includes credit for daily breakfasts at the Grill (which showcases fresh produce picked from the hotel’s garden) and two 90-minute massages at the spa. In addition, the concierge staff will help guests create a Napa Valley wine-tasting itinerary based on their individual preferences. (Most itineraries include one winery visit in the morning, lunch in St. Helena or Yountville, and two additional winery visits in the afternoon.) 
A bottle of Russian River Valley Pinot Noir awaits guests at Farmhouse Inn, to sip before retiring to their king deluxe room that features a hardwood deck and a bathroom with a deep soaking tub. After a farm-fresh breakfast, guests can relax with two hour-long massages at the spa before visiting some of the finest Sonoma County vineyards and wineries. Starting at $4,000 per couple, the package is available from November 1 to March 31. ( meadowood.com ; farmhouseinn.com )
